name: Don't Escape: 4 Days in a Wasteland
description: Survive through four days at the end of the world in this post-apocalyptic point-and-click thriller where your choices could keep you alive... or not.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2, Windows Vista, Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Dual Core 1.4 GHz Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: supporting DX9 (shader model 3.0) Storage: 800 MB available space
